Stepper

The step by step process should be 3-5 steps, with the buttons to navigate moving on or exiting aligned right next to the progress tracker.

There are three different states for the progress bar: a completed step, the step that the user is currently in, and a step that is yet to come.

  1. 3-5 Steps
  2. Step descriptions should be no more than two words and be easily understood
  3. Action button to move onto the next step is disabled until the user completes all necessary steps on the page. On the final summary page, the action button changes from “next” to “submit” to clearly mark the final step in the process.

3 Points Stepper

  • Done Step
  • Current Step
  • Available Step

4 Points Stepper

  • Done Step
  • Done Step
  • Current Step
  • Available Step

5 Points Stepper

  • Done Step
  • Done Step
  • Current Step
  • Available Step
  • Available Step

Bottom Bar

The segmented border is for illustration purposes only. Bottom Bar position is fixed to the bottom of the contant area when used in real instances
